response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product, valued at $800,000 to you, represents not just an investment but a symbol of excellence and innovation. We understand the importance of making such a significant purchase and have decided to offer you this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is available only to discerning buyers like yourself, who appreciate the unparalleled quality and value we provide. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 750000}
